channel.title: XN - Psychedelic [Chill Trap] [Experimental-ish]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/xn-extras/psychedelic
No, I've never taken drugs, but this is what I imagine it to sound like.
Found a real old track of mine (was literally just the melody + kick/snare). Instantly had some weird inspiration and ended up going more on the experimental side and finished it in one day. It's pretty different from what I usually make, so let me know what you think.
It's by no means perfect, but I'm trying to push out more tracks or else i'll just end up sitting on them forever (maybe I should try and keep a release schedule of some sort).
